languages.text: {n}Соломон медленно поднимает руку. Лицо искажено мукой — может, раны, а может, слова, что он силится произнести, причиняют ему боль.{/n} "Глейто, протокол Мортем-80. Охранять цель". {n}Дрожащий палец указывает на вас.{/n}

{n}Solomorne slowly raises his hand. His face is twisted in torment — perhaps his injuries are causing him pain, or perhaps it is the words he is trying to force out.{/n} "Glaito, Protocol Mortem-80. Guard the target." {n}Solomorne points a trembling finger at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон медленно поднимает руку. Лицо искажено мукой — может, раны, а может, слова, что он силится произнести, причиняют ему боль.{/n} "Глейто, протокол Мортем-80. Охранять цель". {n}Дрожащий палец указывает на вас.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはゆっくりと手を上げた。彼の顔は苦痛に歪んでいた。負傷のせいかもしれないし、あるいは無理に言葉を絞り出そうとしているせいかもしれない。{/n}「グライト、プロトコル・モーテム-80。ターゲットを護衛しろ」{n}ソロモーンは震える指であなたを指さした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne slowly raises his hand. His face is twisted in torment — perhaps his injuries are causing him pain, or perhaps it is the words he is trying to force out.{/n} "Glaito, Protocol Mortem-80. Guard the target." {n}Solomorne points a trembling finger at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはゆっくりと手を上げた。彼の顔は苦痛に歪んでいた。負傷のせいかもしれないし、あるいは無理に言葉を絞り出そうとしているせいかもしれない。{/n}「グライト、プロトコル・モーテム-80。ターゲットを護衛しろ」{n}ソロモーンは震える指であなたを指さした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne hebt langsam eine Hand. Sein Gesicht ist leidverzerrt – vielleicht bereiten seine Wunden ihm Schmerzen, oder vielleicht sind es die Worte, die er herauszupressen sucht.{/n} "Glaito, Protokoll Mortem-80. Bewache das Ziel." {n}Solomorne deutet mit einem zitternden Finger auf dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne slowly raises his hand. His face is twisted in torment — perhaps his injuries are causing him pain, or perhaps it is the words he is trying to force out.{/n} "Glaito, Protocol Mortem-80. Guard the target." {n}Solomorne points a trembling finger at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne hebt langsam eine Hand. Sein Gesicht ist leidverzerrt – vielleicht bereiten seine Wunden ihm Schmerzen, oder vielleicht sind es die Worte, die er herauszupressen sucht.{/n} "Glaito, Protokoll Mortem-80. Bewache das Ziel." {n}Solomorne deutet mit einem zitternden Finger auf dich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lève lentement la main. Son visage est déformé par la douleur, mais vous ne savez pas si c'est à cause de ses blessures ou s'il s'agit du déchirement de devoir prononcer ces mots.{/n} « Glaito, protocole Mortem-80. Protège la cible. » {n}L'arbitrator vous désigne d'un doigt tremblant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne slowly raises his hand. His face is twisted in torment — perhaps his injuries are causing him pain, or perhaps it is the words he is trying to force out.{/n} "Glaito, Protocol Mortem-80. Guard the target." {n}Solomorne points a trembling finger at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lève lentement la main. Son visage est déformé par la douleur, mais vous ne savez pas si c'est à cause de ses blessures ou s'il s'agit du déchirement de devoir prononcer ces mots.{/n} « Glaito, protocole Mortem-80. Protège la cible. » {n}L'arbitrator vous désigne d'un doigt tremblant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne levanta la mano despacio. Tiene el rostro contraído por el dolor; quizá sea por sus heridas, o puede que sean las palabras que se esfuerza por pronunciar.{/n} «Glaito, Protocolo Mortem-80. Protege al objetivo». {n}Solomorne te señala con un dedo tembloroso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne slowly raises his hand. His face is twisted in torment — perhaps his injuries are causing him pain, or perhaps it is the words he is trying to force out.{/n} "Glaito, Protocol Mortem-80. Guard the target." {n}Solomorne points a trembling finger at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne levanta la mano despacio. Tiene el rostro contraído por el dolor; quizá sea por sus heridas, o puede que sean las palabras que se esfuerza por pronunciar.{/n} «Glaito, Protocolo Mortem-80. Protege al objetivo». {n}Solomorne te señala con un dedo tembloroso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙慢慢举起了手，他的脸痛苦地扭曲着——或许是由于他身上的伤口，也或许是由于他接下来要说的话。{/n}“格雷托，至高协议80号，守卫目标。”{n}索罗蒙举起颤抖的手指，指着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne slowly raises his hand. His face is twisted in torment — perhaps his injuries are causing him pain, or perhaps it is the words he is trying to force out.{/n} "Glaito, Protocol Mortem-80. Guard the target." {n}Solomorne points a trembling finger at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙慢慢举起了手，他的脸痛苦地扭曲着——或许是由于他身上的伤口，也或许是由于他接下来要说的话。{/n}“格雷托，至高协议80号，守卫目标。”{n}索罗蒙举起颤抖的手指，指着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne yavaşça elini kaldırıyor. Yüzü ızdırap içinde buruşmuş, ya yaraları yüzünden ya da söylemeye çalıştığı şeyler yüzünden acı çekiyor.{/n} "Glaito, 80. Ölüm Sonrası Protokolü. Hedefi koru." {n}Solomorne, titreyen parmağıyla seni gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne slowly raises his hand. His face is twisted in torment — perhaps his injuries are causing him pain, or perhaps it is the words he is trying to force out.{/n} "Glaito, Protocol Mortem-80. Guard the target." {n}Solomorne points a trembling finger at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne yavaşça elini kaldırır. Yüzü ızdırap içinde buruşmuştur. Yaraları nedeniyle acı çekiyor olabilir. Belki de söylemeye çalıştığı şeyler yüzündendir.{/n} "Glaito, Ölüm Sonrası Protokolü 80, hedefi koru." {n}Solomorne, titreyen parmağıyla seni gösterir.{/n}
